alert.note: Alert for Hancock (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 31 at 11:23PM CDT until August 01 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of east Tennessee, including the following county, Hancock. Portions of southwest Virginia, including the following counties, Lee and Scott. * WHEN...Until 330 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1223 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Jonesville, Pennington Gap, Duffield, Clinchport, Pattonsville, Dryden and Jasper. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
